website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but these USB-C headphones deliver an excellent level of audio quality.
pros: works with quite a few different Android smartphone models
Includes a microphone for voice calls
Offers a few different sizes of ear pads, so you can find the most secure fit
cons: Wiring inside the headphones may loosen with rough treatment

customer_reviews.title: No dongle, not too expensive
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Finally, a reasonably priced Headphone set for my pixel 2 where I don't need to use a dongle. I've only had it for a week so I don't know how long it will last. But at the moment, the sound quality is good for my needs, which are mostly talking on the phone and listening to podcasts.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Nitzberg

customer_reviews.title: Flaky but effective
customer_reviews.text: There are very few USB-C headset options out there. For that reason they are four stars instead of 3. They are good enough, but I wish the ear buds stayed in better, Also (and this could be my phone's fault) they don't always connect on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was very pleased. They seemed to be great quality and they sounded really good. After using these as my primary workout earphones they only held up for about two weeks. First the protective screen fell off and then a day later they started shorting out where the wiring meets the usb-c connection. Any slight bend and the music pauses and stops playing..... extremely annoying and basically renders them useless unless you plan on not moving at all. I wish I would've just spent another ten bucks and got a pair of replacement pixel buds instead
customer_reviews.author: CGLive

customer_reviews.title: Left earphone no longer works
customer_reviews.text: Worked really great for awhile,..last about a month...left earpiece doesn't produce sound...and now when I call/receive calls...the other person cannot hear me clearly? So perhaps the mic function is bad as well.
customer_reviews.author: C_TexLive

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I tried these with a bunch of devices, and it worked on all of them. OnePlus 6t, LG G7, Samsung Galaxy S8 Active, Asus ZenPad Z500m, and even a LeEco S3. They sound giod. (I'm not an audiophile.) No lag between sound and video. The shape is a bit weird, but actually works pretty well. The stock ear bud covers are on the large size, but it comes with several sizes. The red on black color scheme looks good.
customer_reviews.author: James Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The beats are very strong. Sounds very clear. It's a bit if pricey. But it's worth it. The only thing about this earphone is the earbud a bit too small or large for me. Maybe it's just because of my ears is different from others???😂😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Using them on the OnePlus 6T. Sound quality is amazing for the inexpensive price tag. Solid bass and no distortion when volume is high. Taking advantage of the OnePlus 6T's custom sound equalizer options. Highly recommend these earbuds!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product was not very good quality. Within a few weeks of using them the USB cord got so hot it actually melted my case. The ear plugs fell off and the wires pulled out of the ear plugs. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only Five Months
customer_reviews.text: Received this product in February. They worked OK until this week, the beginning of July, when the right ear bud has completely stopped working. There was no reason for it to break (dropping, stepping on it, water, etc) It just worked one minute and died the next. Recharged it, reconnected it, and it is done... Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Megan P.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphone with such a price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headphones for my new phone because it only has a USB 3 port. The sound quality is good with such a price. The sound is clear and also good for music. The material is also looks good to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Good Audio, Bad Mic
customer_reviews.text: They sound pretty decent, been using them on a One Plus 6T. Giving 3 stars because either the nic doesn't work at all or it is just not that great. I've had about 3-4 calls with them and they just didn't work. Great for audio only use.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A

customer_reviews.title: work with Pixel 2 & Pixel 4
customer_reviews.text: Hard for the other person to hear if there is an motion or wind near the speaker. But they work with Pixel 2 & Pixel 4
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: Item is not durable
customer_reviews.text: The item was working well, but after six weeks of use it just heat up and making hissing sounds. Since it's after one month return time I got hold of Amazon. They tried troubleshooting with me but nothing changed. So they said will contact manufacturer of the TriLink but no response from manufacturer to date. I'm so disappointed the item is not durable. Maybe it's made to last just after return time so buyer cannot return and loses money.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Jenje

customer_reviews.title: Sounds nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice and loud, I don't know if it is my ears or the style of the buds but if you move your head around they tend to fall out
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Failed microphone
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't take a phone call as the microphone switch failed to work, I tried to make and receive calls but no incoming sound or outgoing voice detected.
customer_reviews.author: Frederic G. Trunzo Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks quickly, would NOT recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these headphones and both ears stopped working in less than a month. I thought I just got a bad set so I got a replacement and again, less than a month in and the right ear stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They stop working within 3 weeks of starting use.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like how the right ear buds stopped working on my first pair and my replacement pair of these earbuds. Now both pair have same exact problem. It took 3 weeks for each pair to stop working. Avoid these earbuds at all cost.
customer_reviews.author: TrueBeneficiary

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great for all sounds and phone calls. Sadly my small ear openings make even the smallest earbud covers too big and they fall out of my ears during activities.
customer_reviews.author: Faun

customer_reviews.title: Average sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was average. Not what they advertise. Sitting in a box unused. Buyer beware, product. It works, but not for people who want great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dosn't last long
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well for my Pixel 2 and HP laptop. It was great for taking calls on both my phone and computer. The quality of the product was poor and only lasted for 2 months. The mic stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love the headphones. I used them everyday. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the OnePlus 6T until husband broke them 😑
customer_reviews.author: samantha dickey

customer_reviews.title: Quality Pair
customer_reviews.text: Like them. Subtle sounds come through very well in action movies and jazz music
customer_reviews.author: Darth Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good for samsung note 8
customer_reviews.text: I m only use two days . Can t be work.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: On OnePlus 6T. Sound quality is amazing for cheap price tags. The bass is solid and has no distortion at high volume. Use OnePlus 6T's custom voice equalizer option. These earplugs are highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: look nice, but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Look great. speakers get attached to your ear and removing the speaker from your ear, the speakers detached from the assembly. You can see the wires. People have a hard time hearing you when I get or place a call.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Excellent service by the seller.
customer_reviews.text: This item is definitely value for money. The packaging is done nicely. The build quality of the item is really good as well as the sound. I had a slight issue but the seller handled it very well.
customer_reviews.author: james Francis manubay

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted about two weeks
customer_reviews.text: The started out fine and then the sound quality went downhill. There is loud static that does not go away. Unusable at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my commutes into the city and at work.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Really good earbuds. I could hear the sound really good, it was soft and clear.I really like the new item. Definitely a plus to have it.
customer_reviews.author: yanghefengshen

customer_reviews.title: You get more than you pay for in sound. But exactly what you pay for In terms of durability.
customer_reviews.text: Really great earbuds. Until they stopped functioning. Sound quality is good, value is excellent, but not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality, easy to use, compatible with MacBook and Android phones.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Broke after only two months of use. The wire shorted out and I can no longer hear anything from one side.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product whit a price si expencive
customer_reviews.text: A earphones of 1 dollar for 23 bucks, horrible sound, don't work for calls.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai

customer_reviews.title: Ear love!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! I've been missing out on so much! These are the best ear buds I've Ever, like Ever!!!!
customer_reviews.author: stacey chandler

customer_reviews.title: it does not work that well with the pixel 2xl
customer_reviews.text: used for cell phone don't work that well with the google pixel x2
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for making phone calls.
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds only work for music. I bought these for my wife's Moto Z2 Force so that she could use them to make phone calls. She was able to talk into the mic but never got any sound back from the other end unless she held the phone to her ear. So technically you CAN NOT use these to make phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Get the USB-C adaptor instead it's $10-15 from Google or other brands
customer_reviews.text: The wire is way too short and feels cheap for price
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Soto

customer_reviews.title: DON'T EVEN THINK ABOUT BUYING THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Product is very cheaply made and sounds terrible no mids or highs even audible when listening at all. Not worth the money at all! Returned this product after exactly 60 seconds of listening.
customer_reviews.author: D Wilson

customer_reviews.title: What "deep bass"?
customer_reviews.text: Hooray something that fits my Pixel 2 without that god awful adapter, but at least my other headphones could carry bass. I found the sound incredibly flat and one dimensional. Any drumming goes unpronounced and the bass is barely noticeable. The sound on these is like the ones that you get at the airport when you have no other option because you forgot yours -- and just as pricey (feels like a ransom). I would not have paid $35 for these. Maybe $10, $15 if I was desperate. I mean, yay for something that works for my phone, but this leaves a lot to desire.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It's a very quality earbud, especially when work with ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very quality earbud, especially when work with HTC U12 and Google Pixel2 cell phone, it works very well. It can do the telephone calling, the calling come with a very clear voice.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

product_meta.title: TriLink USB Type C Earbud Headphones (Hi-Res Audio & DAC Chipset) in-Ear Earphone with Mic for Google Pixel 2/2XL, Sony Xperia XZ2, Motorola Moto Z, HTC U12/U11, OnePlus 6/5/5T, LG V30/V20, Essential
feature_bullets: Compatibility IMPORTANT - This USB C earphone has been tested and proven to fit Google Pixel 2/2XL, Sony Xperia XZ2/Compact, Motorola Moto Z series, HTC U12/U11/U Ultra/10, OnePlus 6/5/5T, LG V30/V20/G7/G7 ThinQ/G6, Huawei P30/P30 Pro/P20/P20 Pro/Lite/Mate 10/Pro, Essential Phone PH-1, Xiaomi mi 8/8 se/mix 2/mix2s/mix/Note3/Note2/6 type c cell phone. (Please use Amazon’s customer Q&A for devices outside of this listing.)

Digital Decoder Chipset - TriLink type c headphones use the newest DAC chipset and support both digital and analog input signals, making it possible to fit most of USB-C audio output devices on the market.

Hi-Res Audio - Our USB C earphone supports audio signals with a dynamic range and bandwidth up to 24 bit/96 kHz, making it possible to bring all of the thrill and excitement of pure, living sound directly to your ears.
Built-in Mic - Hands-free in-line microphone and remote allow you to answer a call while running, jogging driving, streaming or on the go. (WITHOUT Volume Control)
What You Get - TriLink USB C earphone with S/M/L earpads, our highly responsive customer service and 100% satisfaction guarantee.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars651 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
